name: Lopez Lucha: Fighting for Kidney Kids" - OE

metadata.name: Comic - Open Edition #1/42
metadata.description:
The "Lopez Lucha: Fighting for Kidney Kids" art exhibit will feature four open-edition pieces, priced at $10.00, $25.00, $50.00, and $100.00, making it accessible for all to support the cause.

By purchasing any of these pieces, you'll be directly contributing towards sending kids with kidney disease to camp through The George Lopez Foundation.

In addition to supporting this amazing cause, the purchaser of each piece will also be taking home a beautiful and inspiring piece of art. Each artwork is a testament to George Lopez's passion and dedication to his cause, and a reminder of the importance of supporting underprivileged children, adults, and military families in need.
